description: When you see Michael Roman, you think he’s a no-bullshit jock who can take on anyone he wants. Fair enough, but in the bedroom, he has a whole other side, and it’s full of submission and the desire to please. Dylan James loves tattoos and muscle, and so does Michael. Because of this, it’s no wonder the two of them take turns fucking each other up the ass bareback!
title: Dylan James And Michael Roman Flip-Fuck
